title: Jack Denmo: TikTok is for Dumb People￼

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "TikTok is for dumb people. It's for people with low IQ. TikTok, you have to essentially communicate to people in such a small amount of time, which means that the people that congregate on there are people with very low attention spans. They have to instantly get that dopamine hit within like 7 to 30 seconds. Their attention span cannot last a whole YouTube video. Their attention span cannot last a still image on an Instagram page. That's not enough for them. They need to be stimulated right away. Super low attention span. They need that crack hit instantly, right? And the people that have the issue where they have a very low attention span, they lack in discipline. They're very impulsive. They usually have eating disorders. And by eating disorders, I don't mean like they're starving themselves to be a model. I mean like they are compulsively eating and consuming food that is very unhealthy for them. They don't exercise. They generally don't try hard. They don't play sports. They don't work out.
